description: Scopri i migliori hotel a North Yorkshire, United Kingdom. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Boutique Yorkshire Dales Retreat with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: Discover an oasis of opulence among the gentle hillsides, whispering creeks and sweeping woodlands of Yorkshire Dales with a luxurious five-star stay at Grantley Hall. Boasting just 47 lavishly furnished rooms, this is an English stay at its most extravagant - savour quiet ritual and bespoke wellness treatments at Three Graces Spa, sip G&Ts fashioned with the hotelâ€™s very own gin at the oak and leather-clad Norton Bar and Courtyard, or head to Bar & Restaurant EightyEight for sumptuous Yorkshire-Chinese fusion fine dining. The hotel is also home to Shaun Rankin at Grantley Hall, a Michelin-starred restaurant plating locally grown produce with unforgettable flair, served in one of the country's most resplendent dining rooms.

seo.title: Hotel a North Yorkshire - United Kingdom Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
